name: Jungle Jewels
description:
Welcome to the Jungle! The jungle is full of sparkling jewels - a paradise for treasure hunters! Jungle Jewels is a beautifully illustrated match three puzzler with a dynamic soundtrack that gets more exciting with each new level. This game is highly recommended to fans of puzzle and match-three games.

Swap jewels vertically or horizontally to form groups of three or more same-colored jewels, collect coins and discover the mystical masks in the temple one level at a time!

FOUR GAME MODES

Classic Mode – Try to complete all your tasks in four levels before the timer runs out
Score Attack – Score big by completing all tasks before the timer runs out
Relaxation Mode – Unlimited time! Take as much time as needed to complete your tasks.
Endless Mode – Endless game play. No time limits; no tasks.

FEATURES:

* Hours of match three puzzle gaming!
* Beautifully illustrated artwork with Retina display support for ingame jewels
* Game Center leaderboards
* Exciting match three gameplay taken to a new dimension
* 4 compelling game modes: Classic, Relaxation, Endless, and Score Attack
* Easily share your high scores with the world and compare with your Facebook friends
* Publish your high scores to your Facebook wall
* A great dynamic soundtrack that gets more and more exciting each level
